title: Textile, "Scenes and figures in the career of Henri IV", ca. 1825
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave; red on white ground
description: Red print on white ground. Background solidly covered with dome-like motif with diagonal line of hatching, 6 vignettes; 1 - combat between warriors and horsemen; 2 - conference between queen and knight; 3 - parting from sweetheart or wife; 4 - conference near ship and sea; 5 - triumphal entry into city; 6 - group of men in tent in front of a castle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Scenes and figures in the career of Henri IV", ca. 1825.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave; red on white ground. 1939-41-1.
